text: Sarah Lawson (born 6 August 1928) is a British actress. She was born in Wadsworth, London, England. She is known for her roles in The Odd Man, The Trollenberg Terror, Bergerac, and Zero One. She made guest appearances in such series as The Avengers, The Saint, Gideon's Way, The Professionals and Danger Man. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British radio actors Category:Actors from London
title: Sarah Lawson
